attributes.title: This bish going down

attributes.userName: ew ew ew that cheeto is gross
attributes.title: disgustingly bad
attributes.review: the app works so poorly and the design is awful and a complete disgrace, i highly discourage anyone from downloading it (unless you want to see how much of a joke it is!) I only have one more thing to say about this ratchet app... no ❤️

attributes.title: Those tiny oranges
attributes.review: I ride horses I came home one day from the barn and my room was filled with pictures of Donald Trump naked 😳 also over 100 oranges🍊 in my room. I knew it was the app so I deleted it later that day he came to my house and took my oranges rip oranges 😪

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: This app is completely absurd I downloaded it to keep up with the rally’s and the next thing I know I’m being stalked by a Cheeto everywhere I go. It just sits there so I went to pick it up and now I have a virus all because of this app!!!!!

attributes.title: very bad awful no good app
attributes.review: Title speaks for itself but! I had high hopes for this app and for our president, but unfortunately he has failed on more than one front. Glitching, crashing, I think it somehow downloaded a virus onto my phone. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: I went to the app to see when the next rally was, and my phone exploded!! I’ve gone through 69 new phones now and everyone of them has broken because of this app. I’m lucky to be alive

attributes.title: Terrible racist disgusting app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever, it’s soo racist and not ok there were very inappropriate pictures on there and he said the black people and Chinese people are the reasons of Corona and every bad thing ever and he wants to do bad things to little kids it’s disgusting 🦔

attributes.title: Trump is stinky🦠🦠
attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw his nudes as the front page😳🤚then I proceed to a video of one of his rally’s but randomly cuts to a secret family tape saying that “he really DOES NOT know what he’s doing and doesn’t know how any of the idiots in this country will ever vote for him”🤨

attributes.title: I’m scared for American citizens
attributes.review: I went into the app and I couldn’t believe my eyes when I saw that our own president was going against Americans citizens who aren’t white and I don’t know why we elected a white supremacist for a president, and he isn’t supported what’s right. BLACK LIVES MATTER!
